        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>ILMoE2193</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">River landforms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fluß landforms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formes de relief de fleuve</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Landforms do rio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Landforms del fiume</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Landforms ποταμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Landforms del río</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animated explanation of how riverflow and drainage patterns effect the landforms in its path</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geomorphology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rivers</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine lebhafte Erklärung von, wie riverflow und 
Entwässerung Effekt die landforms in seinem Pfad patterns</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une explication animée de la façon dont le 
riverflow et le drainage a modelé l'effet les formes de relief dans sa 
voie d'accès</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma explanação animated de como o riverflow e a
drenagem modelaram o efeito os landforms em seu trajeto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una spiegazione animata di come il riverflow ed 
il drenaggio ha modellato l'effetto i landforms in relativo percorso</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωντανεψοντη εξήγηση για το πώς riverflow και τα 
πρότυπα αποξηράνσεων επηρεάζουν landforms στο μονοπάτι του</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una explicación animada de cómo el riverflow y 
el drenaje modeló efecto los landforms en su camino</string>
          </description>
